poem:
Title: "In Tenuous Game of Power"

In the white-washed House of surmising,
Operates a peace-making guise,
And Gaza, a child with eyes on the ball, waits.
Hamas or not, the court's echo resounds,
A game of thrones with Netanyahu's frown.
John Kirby insists, it's not us who spun,
This peace proposal's ploy, under the searing sun.
